name: King Of Gods: Angel The Awakening Of A Demon
description: King Of Gods aka K.O.G. is a 2D RPG released by O.T.B.S. The game was developed and written by Westwood W. Hinds... The first release of K.O.G. is Chapter 1: Angel The Awakening Of A Demon....
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, or 10 Processor: 1 Ghz or Intel Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
